review: This ofloxacin gave me a maximum side effect, I woke up at night with anxiety attack, muscular and joint pain, increase heartbeat, tremor etc. So it is better to avoid this medicine even taking this medicine is must.
Floxin (ofloxacin):please avoid this drug Floxin it is dangerous.Only take this drug, when death is second option.
Med works great but it does seem to give you anxiety.Less side effects than Cipro.

This medicine gave me terrible anxiety, could not sleep, very high pulse and blood pressure and migraines.  The doctor had me quit taking it immediately.  I suggest seeing if there are other options before taking Ofloxacin.  It can cause permanent damage altering your health for life.

The doctor told me it would help within 48 hours and it did.Thank God for cranberry juice which helped me pass the kidney stone that probably led to the urinary tract infection in the first place.  I drank the juice and 5 minutes later out came the stone, without any discomfort!  Saved me 48 hours of anguish!
When the doctor gave me this medicine I felt a lot better. In my opinion it is effective.
